data.oai_dc:dc: This file includes raw data included in figures and tables of this manuscript. Each row contains data of one pond visit, such as GPS location, ranavirus die-off, date, dipnet survey, amphibian density, amphibian presence/absence, date of die-off, average log 10 ranavirus eDNA titer, average log 10 ranavirus larvae titer, respective standard errors, and any notes.
